title: Abot – Anonymous Feeback for Slack Teams
author: pawurb
content: abotanonymous feeback slack teamsyet another never-ending meeting? coworkers habits keep annoying ? you like share thoughts dont to step as troublemaker?abot the rescue! provides simple command allowing to submit honest anonymous feedback.privacy policyapp collects minimum amount user data needed it function properly. bot user does post spam.disclaimer you are a free standard plan anonymity is guaranteed. teams compliance exports enabled (optional slack plus plan feature) be able determine sender the message. messages sent prior activating compliance exports are included it everything send before remains anonymous. sorry, there is way hack around ¯\_()_/¯support emailp.urbanek89 gmail.com© pawe urbanek 2017
